root.cn: 全球几十万小朋友都在玩的《宝宝乐园》系列之农场发现游戏！ 农场里有各种动物，植物，水果和蔬菜,他们都藏起来了，小朋友们快来找一找，快来挑战一下你的智力吧！ * 爸爸妈妈的明智选择，开启孩子们智慧大门！ * 培养宝宝的观察力和视觉搜索能力。 * 提高宝宝们的形象思维能力。 * 丰富的关卡让宝宝玩个够，越玩越聪明！ ！
root.en: Hundreds of thousands of children in the world are playing games on the "baby paradise" series farm. There are all kinds of animals, plants, fruits and vegetables on the farm. They are all hidden. Children come and look for them. Let's challenge your intelligence. * father and mother's wise choice, open the door of children's wisdom! * develop the baby's observation ability and visual search ability. * improve children's image thinking ability. * rich checkpoints allow your baby to play enough, the more you play, the smarter you are!
